analytic.title: The Author of the Arabic Diatessaron

monogr.title: Miscellanea Neotestamentica: Studia ad Novum Testamentum praesertim pertinentia a sociis sodalicii batavi, c.n. studiosorum Novi Testamenti conventus anno MCMLXXVI, quintum lustrum feliciter complentis suspecta

body.bibl: Baarda, Tjitze. “The Author of the Arabic Diatessaron.” In Miscellanea Neotestamentica: Studia Ad Novum Testamentum Praesertim Pertinentia a Sociis Sodalicii Batavi, c.n. Studiosorum Novi Testamenti Conventus Anno MCMLXXVI, Quintum Lustrum Feliciter Complentis Suspecta, edited by Tjitze Baarda, Albertus Frederik Johannes Klijn, and Willem Cornelis van Unnik, 1:61–103. Supplements to Novum Testamentum 47. Leiden: E.J. Brill, 1978.

Tjitze Baarda, The Author of the Arabic Diatessaron, in Miscellanea Neotestamentica: Studia Ad Novum Testamentum Praesertim Pertinentia a Sociis Sodalicii Batavi, c.n. Studiosorum Novi Testamenti Conventus Anno MCMLXXVI, Quintum Lustrum Feliciter Complentis Suspecta, ed. Tjitze Baarda, Albertus Frederik Johannes Klijn, and Willem Cornelis van Unnik, vol. 1, Supplements to Novum Testamentum 47 (Leiden: E.J. Brill, 1978), 61–103.
